item.title: Rack Monitoring System Development
item.author: sirichiu8632@gmail.com (Siri Chiu)
item.description: Responsible for the full-stack design and implementation of the Rack Monitoring System. Developed a Golang Agent to collect data from servers, switches, and PDUs via IPMI and SNMP protocols, integrating Prometheus and Grafana to achieve real-time visual monitoring and ensure equipment stability in the data center.

item.title: Software Engineer
item.author: sirichiu8632@gmail.com (Siri Chiu)
item.description: Specializing in Full-Stack Automation, Server Thermal Algorithms (patent pending), and AI Implementation. Developed server cooling algorithms, predictive burn-in modules, and an OpenAI code review bot (saving 30% of review time). Expert in Golang/Python full-stack development and DevOps workflow integration.

item.title: Server Cooling Control Algorithm: Automated PID Parameter Generation System Based on Steady-State Thermal Profiles
item.author: sirichiu8632@gmail.com (Siri Chiu)
item.description: This project aims to solve the dual challenges of “low R&D efficiency” and “energy loss” in data center server cooling control. To address the over-design caused by traditional open-loop control and the high time cost of manual PID tuning, I developed an “Automated Thermal Characteristic Identification System.”

item.title: Smart Automated Stress Testing System: Integrating Physical Characteristic Modeling Prediction and AI Visualization Analysis
item.author: sirichiu8632@gmail.com (Siri Chiu)
item.description: This project developed a distributed automated stress testing system based on Golang, aimed at solving two major pain points of traditional testing tools: “difficulty in precisely controlling system wattage” and “difficulty interpreting massive data.”

item.title: Fully Automated Tech Information Aggregation Platform: Content Workflow Based on n8n and Local LLM
item.author: sirichiu8632@gmail.com (Siri Chiu)
item.description: This project built an end-to-end automated content publishing system, aimed at solving the “information gap” between the Traditional Chinese community and international tech communities.

item.title: Redmine Smart Companion: Reshaping Time Management with Desktop Automation Tool
item.author: sirichiu8632@gmail.com (Siri Chiu)
item.description: This project developed a cross-platform desktop application designed to solve the “cumbersome operation” and “workflow interruption” problems engineers face when logging time in the Redmine system.

item.title: High-Frequency Ultrafast Ultrasound Micro-Doppler Imaging for Finger Tendon Neovascularity Assessment
item.author: sirichiu8632@gmail.com (Siri Chiu)
item.description: I propose a microvascular imaging algorithm that can clearly visualize the vascular tree structure of mouse kidneys and neovascularity information in injured finger tendons, with maximum resolution reaching 35μm diameter.

item.title: Projectile Vector Doppler Imaging for Venous Valve Blood Flow Analysis
item.author: sirichiu8632@gmail.com (Siri Chiu)
item.description: Projectile Vector Doppler Imaging provides more diverse blood information than traditional Doppler imaging, such as flow velocity, flow direction, and turbulence conditions, giving physicians more diagnostic information.

item.title: Deep Q-Network in Practice: A TensorFlow-Based Four-Layer Neural Network Snake Agent
item.author: sirichiu8632@gmail.com (Siri Chiu)
item.description: This project applies Deep Reinforcement Learning to the classic Snake game. To enable the Agent to make optimal decisions in a dynamic environment, I designed a custom four-layer fully connected network using the TensorFlow framework as the core Q-Network.

item.title: Hand Tendon Displacement Evaluation Technology
item.author: sirichiu8632@gmail.com (Siri Chiu)
item.description: Vector Doppler Imaging can observe more target motion changes. Besides blood flow velocity estimation, it can also be applied to tendons to evaluate tendon gliding, providing physicians with displacement information for more comprehensive assessment.

item.title: Mechanism Synthesis Optimization: MATLAB-Based Numerical Path Generator for Four-Bar Linkage
item.author: sirichiu8632@gmail.com (Siri Chiu)
item.description: This project explores a classic problem in mechanism design—“Path Generation.” The goal is to design a four-bar linkage whose coupler curve precisely passes through 9 specified target points in space.

item.title: MobileNet and Cloud-Collaborative Pose Recognition Application
item.author: sirichiu8632@gmail.com (Siri Chiu)
item.description: This project aims to address the lack of exercise motivation and digital divide among elderly people in an aging society. We developed an interactive game system based on AI body recognition, including “Memory Card Flip” and “Yoga Guidance,” allowing seniors to exercise and rehabilitate at home using simple equipment.

item.title: Morphological Fingerprint Feature Extraction: Noise Suppression and Structure Enhancement Based on Bowler-Hat Transform
item.author: sirichiu8632@gmail.com (Siri Chiu)
item.description: This project implements an advanced mathematical morphology processing pipeline using MATLAB. Through Top-Hat operations to filter out background stains, and introducing Bowler-Hat Transform for structure enhancement. Experimental results confirm that this algorithm can effectively restore ridge features of contaminated fingerprints while also validating the algorithm’s versatility for image processing in different domains.

item.title: Smart Medical Diagnostic Aid: ResNet50-Based Chest X-Ray Pneumonia Classifier
item.author: sirichiu8632@gmail.com (Siri Chiu)
item.description: This project aims to develop a deep learning-based automated diagnostic assistance system to help medical professionals quickly interpret chest X-ray images (CXR).

item.title: IoT Temperature and Humidity Sensor Real-Time Monitoring System
item.author: sirichiu8632@gmail.com (Siri Chiu)
item.description: Using MQTT transport protocol as the foundation, implementing a basic IoT remote real-time monitoring system through Raspberry Pi, NodeMCU and other devices.

item.title: Long-Term Care 2.0 Service Integration Platform
item.author: sirichiu8632@gmail.com (Siri Chiu)
item.description: A long-term care service integration platform designed to improve Taiwan’s long-term care environment. The concept of this project is to bring long-term care services into the home, reducing the burden on family members. By designing convenient APP calling methods for elderly users to operate the system independently.

item.title: Digital Signal Processing & Firmware Engineer
item.author: sirichiu8632@gmail.com (Siri Chiu)
item.description: Specializing in Ultrasound Signal Processing (DSP) and Firmware Development, successfully implementing technologies in consumer electronics like the ROG Phone. Led the development of a C# (WPF) automated calibration SDK, analyzing sliding gestures through algorithms to maximize the efficiency of complex production line tuning processes. Possesses full English cross-border collaboration capabilities, familiar with mass production technical support and crisis management during PVT/MP stages.
